properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname(s) to query (e.g., 'work' or ['work', 'personal']). Omit to query all accounts.

tools.name: list-events
tools.description: List events from one or more calendars. Supports both calendar IDs and calendar names.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname(s) to query (e.g., 'work' or ['work', 'personal']). Omit to query all accounts.

properties.name: timeMin
properties.description: Start of time range (ISO 8601, e.g., '2024-01-01T00:00:00').

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: IANA timezone (e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'). Defaults to calendar's timezone.

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Additional fields to include beyond defaults (id, summary, start, end, status, htmlLink, location, attendees).

properties.name: privateExtendedProperty
properties.description: Filter by private extended properties (key=value). Matches events that have all specified properties.

properties.name: sharedExtendedProperty
properties.description: Filter by shared extended properties (key=value). Matches events that have all specified properties.

tools.name: search-events
tools.description: Search for events in a calendar by text query.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname(s) to query (e.g., 'work' or ['work', 'personal']). Omit to query all accounts.

properties.name: calendarId
properties.description: Calendar identifier(s) to search. Accepts calendar IDs or names. Single or multiple calendars supported.

properties.name: query
properties.description: Free text search query (searches summary, description, location, attendees, etc.)

properties.name: timeMin
properties.description: Start of time range (ISO 8601, e.g., '2024-01-01T00:00:00').

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: IANA timezone (e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'). Defaults to calendar's timezone.

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Additional fields to include beyond defaults (id, summary, start, end, status, htmlLink, location, attendees).

properties.name: privateExtendedProperty
properties.description: Filter by private extended properties (key=value). Matches events that have all specified properties.

properties.name: sharedExtendedProperty
properties.description: Filter by shared extended properties (key=value). Matches events that have all specified properties.

tools.name: get-event
tools.description: Get details of a specific event by ID.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname (e.g., 'work'). Optional if only one account connected.

properties.name: calendarId
properties.description: ID of the calendar (use 'primary' for the main calendar)

properties.name: eventId
properties.description: ID of the event to retrieve

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Optional array of additional event fields to retrieve. Available fields are strictly validated. Default fields (id, summary, start, end, status, htmlLink, location, attendees) are always included.

tools.name: list-colors
tools.description: List available color IDs and their meanings for calendar events

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname (e.g., 'work'). Optional if only one account connected.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname (e.g., 'work'). Optional if only one account connected.

properties.name: calendarId
properties.description: ID of the calendar (use 'primary' for the main calendar)

properties.name: eventId
properties.description: Optional custom event ID (5-1024 characters, base32hex encoding: lowercase letters a-v and digits 0-9 only). If not provided, Google Calendar will generate one.

properties.name: summary
properties.description: Title of the event

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description/notes for the event

properties.name: start
properties.description: Event start time: '2025-01-01T10:00:00' for timed events or '2025-01-01' for all-day events. Also accepts Google Calendar API object format: {date: '2025-01-01'} or {dateTime: '2025-01-01T10:00:00', timeZone: 'America/Los_Angeles'}

properties.name: end
properties.description: Event end time: '2025-01-01T11:00:00' for timed events or '2025-01-02' for all-day events (exclusive). Also accepts Google Calendar API object format: {date: '2025-01-02'} or {dateTime: '2025-01-01T11:00:00', timeZone: 'America/Los_Angeles'}

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: Timezone as IANA Time Zone Database name (e.g., America/Los_Angeles). Takes priority over calendar's default timezone. Only used for timezone-naive datetime strings.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location of the event

properties.name: attendees
properties.description: List of event attendees with their details

nestedProperties.name: optional
nestedProperties.description: Whether this is an optional attendee

nestedProperties.name: additionalGuests
nestedProperties.description: Number of additional guests the attendee is bringing

properties.name: colorId
properties.description: Color ID for the event (use list-colors to see available IDs)

properties.name: reminders
properties.description: Reminder settings for the event

nestedProperties.name: useDefault
nestedProperties.description: Whether to use the default reminders

nestedProperties.name: minutes
nestedProperties.description: Minutes before the event to trigger the reminder

properties.name: recurrence
properties.description: Recurrence rules in RFC5545 format (e.g., ["RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;COUNT=5"])

properties.name: transparency
properties.description: Whether the event blocks time on the calendar. 'opaque' means busy, 'transparent' means free.

properties.name: visibility
properties.description: Visibility of the event. Use 'public' for public events, 'private' for private events visible to attendees.

properties.name: guestsCanInviteOthers
properties.description: Whether attendees can invite others to the event. Default is true.

properties.name: guestsCanModify
properties.description: Whether attendees can modify the event. Default is false.

properties.name: guestsCanSeeOtherGuests
properties.description: Whether attendees can see the list of other attendees. Default is true.

properties.name: anyoneCanAddSelf
properties.description: Whether anyone can add themselves to the event. Default is false.

properties.name: sendUpdates
properties.description: Whether to send notifications about the event creation. 'all' sends to all guests, 'externalOnly' to non-Google Calendar users only, 'none' sends no notifications.

properties.name: conferenceData
properties.description: Conference properties for the event. Use createRequest to add a new conference.

nestedProperties.name: createRequest
nestedProperties.description: Request to generate a new conference

nestedProperties.name: requestId
nestedProperties.description: Client-generated unique ID for this request to ensure idempotency

properties.name: extendedProperties
properties.description: Extended properties for storing application-specific data. Max 300 properties totaling 32KB.

nestedProperties.name: private
nestedProperties.description: Properties private to the application. Keys can have max 44 chars, values max 1024 chars.

nestedProperties.name: shared
nestedProperties.description: Properties visible to all attendees. Keys can have max 44 chars, values max 1024 chars.

properties.name: attachments
properties.description: File attachments for the event. Requires calendar to support attachments.

nestedProperties.name: iconLink
nestedProperties.description: URL of the icon for the attachment

nestedProperties.name: fileId
nestedProperties.description: ID of the attached file in Google Drive

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source of the event, such as a web page or email message.

properties.name: calendarsToCheck
properties.description: List of calendar IDs to check for conflicts (defaults to just the target calendar)

properties.name: duplicateSimilarityThreshold
properties.description: Threshold for duplicate detection (0-1, default: 0.7). Events with similarity above this are flagged as potential duplicates

properties.name: allowDuplicates
properties.description: If true, allows creation even when exact duplicates are detected (similarity >= 0.95). Default is false which blocks duplicate creation

properties.name: eventType
properties.description: Type of the event. 'default' for regular events, 'focusTime' for Focus Time blocks, 'outOfOffice' for Out of Office events, 'workingLocation' for Working Location events. Note: outOfOffice and workingLocation require Google Workspace and only work on primary calendar.

properties.name: focusTimeProperties
properties.description: Focus Time properties. Only used when eventType is 'focusTime'. Requires Google Workspace.

properties.name: outOfOfficeProperties
properties.description: Out of Office properties. Only used when eventType is 'outOfOffice'. Requires Google Workspace.

nestedProperties.name: autoDeclineMode
nestedProperties.description: How to handle conflicting meetings. Default is to decline all conflicts.

nestedProperties.name: declineMessage
nestedProperties.description: Message sent when declining invitations (e.g., 'I'm out of office, will respond when I return')

properties.name: workingLocationProperties
properties.description: Working Location properties. Only used when eventType is 'workingLocation'. Requires Google Workspace.

nestedProperties.name: homeOffice
nestedProperties.description: Empty object for home office type

nestedProperties.name: label
nestedProperties.description: Office name shown in Calendar (e.g., 'HQ Building', 'NYC Office')

nestedProperties.name: label
nestedProperties.description: Label for custom location (e.g., 'Coffee Shop', 'Client Site')

tools.name: update-event
tools.description: Update an existing calendar event with recurring event modification scope support.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname (e.g., 'work'). Optional if only one account connected.

properties.name: calendarId
properties.description: ID of the calendar (use 'primary' for the main calendar)

properties.name: eventId
properties.description: ID of the event to update

properties.name: summary
properties.description: Updated title of the event

properties.name: description
properties.description: Updated description/notes

properties.name: start
properties.description: Updated start time: '2025-01-01T10:00:00' for timed events or '2025-01-01' for all-day events. Also accepts Google Calendar API object format: {date: '2025-01-01'} or {dateTime: '2025-01-01T10:00:00', timeZone: 'America/Los_Angeles'}

properties.name: end
properties.description: Updated end time: '2025-01-01T11:00:00' for timed events or '2025-01-02' for all-day events (exclusive). Also accepts Google Calendar API object format: {date: '2025-01-02'} or {dateTime: '2025-01-01T11:00:00', timeZone: 'America/Los_Angeles'}

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: Updated timezone as IANA Time Zone Database name. If not provided, uses the calendar's default timezone.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Updated location

properties.name: attendees
properties.description: Updated attendee list

properties.name: colorId
properties.description: Updated color ID

properties.name: reminders
properties.description: Reminder settings for the event

nestedProperties.name: useDefault
nestedProperties.description: Whether to use the default reminders

nestedProperties.name: minutes
nestedProperties.description: Minutes before the event to trigger the reminder

properties.name: recurrence
properties.description: Recurrence rules in RFC5545 format (e.g., ["RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;COUNT=5"])

properties.name: sendUpdates
properties.description: Whether to send update notifications

properties.name: modificationScope
properties.description: Scope for recurring event modifications

properties.name: originalStartTime
properties.description: Original start time in the ISO 8601 format '2024-01-01T10:00:00'

properties.name: futureStartDate
properties.description: Start date for future instances in the ISO 8601 format '2024-01-01T10:00:00'

properties.name: checkConflicts
properties.description: Whether to check for conflicts when updating (default: true when changing time)

properties.name: calendarsToCheck
properties.description: List of calendar IDs to check for conflicts (defaults to just the target calendar)

properties.name: conferenceData
properties.description: Conference properties for the event. Used to add or update Google Meet links.

nestedProperties.name: createRequest
nestedProperties.description: Request to generate a new conference for this event

nestedProperties.name: requestId
nestedProperties.description: Client-generated unique ID for this request to ensure idempotency

properties.name: transparency
properties.description: Whether the event blocks time on the calendar. 'opaque' means busy, 'transparent' means available

properties.name: visibility
properties.description: Visibility of the event

properties.name: guestsCanInviteOthers
properties.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can invite others

properties.name: guestsCanModify
properties.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can modify the event

properties.name: guestsCanSeeOtherGuests
properties.description: Whether attendees other than the organizer can see who the event's attendees are

properties.name: anyoneCanAddSelf
properties.description: Whether anyone can add themselves to the event

properties.name: extendedProperties
properties.description: Extended properties for the event

nestedProperties.name: private
nestedProperties.description: Properties that are private to the creator's app

nestedProperties.name: shared
nestedProperties.description: Properties that are shared between all apps

properties.name: attachments
properties.description: File attachments for the event

nestedProperties.name: iconLink
nestedProperties.description: URL link to the attachment's icon

nestedProperties.name: fileId
nestedProperties.description: ID of the attached Google Drive file

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname (e.g., 'work'). Optional if only one account connected.

properties.name: calendarId
properties.description: ID of the calendar (use 'primary' for the main calendar)

properties.name: eventId
properties.description: ID of the event to delete

properties.name: sendUpdates
properties.description: Whether to send cancellation notifications

tools.name: get-freebusy
tools.description: Query free/busy information for calendars. Note: Time range is limited to a maximum of 3 months between timeMin and timeMax.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname(s) to query (e.g., 'work' or ['work', 'personal']). Omit to query all accounts.

properties.name: calendars
properties.description: List of calendars and/or groups to query for free/busy information

nestedProperties.name: id
nestedProperties.description: ID of the calendar (use 'primary' for the main calendar)

properties.name: timeMin
properties.description: Start of time range (ISO 8601, e.g., '2024-01-01T00:00:00').

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: IANA timezone for the query.

properties.name: groupExpansionMax
properties.description: Maximum number of calendars to expand per group (max 100)

properties.name: calendarExpansionMax
properties.description: Maximum number of calendars to expand (max 50)

tools.name: get-current-time
tools.description: Get the current date and time. Call this FIRST before creating, updating, or searching for events to ensure you have accurate date context for scheduling.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname (e.g., 'work'). Optional if only one account connected.

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: IANA timezone (e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'). Defaults to calendar's timezone.

tools.name: respond-to-event
tools.description: Respond to a calendar event invitation with Accept, Decline, Maybe (Tentative), or No Response.

properties.name: calendarId
properties.description: ID of the calendar (use 'primary' for the main calendar)

properties.name: eventId
properties.description: ID of the event to respond to

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account nickname to use for this operation (e.g., 'work', 'personal'). Optional when only one account is connected - will auto-select the account with appropriate permissions. Use 'list-calendars' to see available accounts.

properties.name: response
properties.description: Your response to the event invitation: 'accepted' (accept), 'declined' (decline), 'tentative' (maybe), 'needsAction' (no response)

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Optional message/note to include with your response (e.g., 'I have a conflict' when declining)

properties.name: modificationScope
properties.description: For recurring events: 'thisEventOnly' responds to just this instance, 'all' responds to all instances. Default is 'all'.

properties.name: originalStartTime
properties.description: Original start time of the specific instance (required when modificationScope is 'thisEventOnly')

properties.name: sendUpdates
properties.description: Whether to send response notifications. 'all' sends to all guests, 'externalOnly' to non-Google Calendar users only, 'none' sends no notifications. Default is 'none'.

duplicates.text: Account nickname(s) to query (e.g., 'work' or ['work', 'personal']). Omit to query all accounts.
